title: Second Language Vocabulary Acquisition Program Using Spaced Repetition

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic German vocabulary and grammar
context.additional_context: A program continuously monitoring learning effectiveness via formative assessments in web-based vocabulary learning environments using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can store over 300 beginner-level German vocabulary items in long-term memory over eight weeks using spaced repetition algorithms.
Learners can achieve a vocabulary acquisition progress rate of 90% or higher through formative assessments.
Learners can achieve 100% of weekly learning goals (15 new vocabulary items + 30 review vocabulary items) following personalized review schedules provided by a web application.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
